title: Forgot to register for ESA thru PESU acad portal
content: So..I forgot to register for ESA thru the pesu acad portal for which deadline was yesterday...and I am really scared what will happen now?Can anyone tell me what I should do now?

comments.body: Nothing, u'll get ur hall ticket dw
Oh Thank god! Thank You so much

Adding more information: 

You are **by default registered for all courses**. The registration page is only if you want to withdraw or drop courses. If you had visited the registration page, you would have noticed that the status for each course would have mentioned "Enrolled" by default.

So even if you don't register, it'll assume you are going to sit for all exams. Regardless, remember to always verify everytime.
